location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 2 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Marine Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is a response to a communication dated 30 July 1824, respecting a petition for a pension from Sukia Gaspar, late Comfiradore [Comprador] of the Marine at Bushire. It states that the petitioner has been given twelve months pay, but been informed that he is not entitled to a pension.
